Trade/Device Name(s): Simplexa™ Flu A/B & RSV Positive Control Pack
Regulation Name(s): Respiratory Viral Panel Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Simplexa Flu A/B & RSV Direct and Positive Control Pack, a multiplex real-time RT-PCR assay for detection and differentiation of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA in human nasopharyngeal swabs using the 3M Integrated Cycler
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection and differentiation of influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA in nasopharyngeal swabs from patients with respiratory tract infection symptoms as an aid in differential diagnosis; not for detection of influenza C; Positive Control Pack is for use only with the Simplexa Flu A/B & RSV Direct kit.
